inbox.title: I think I discovered the purpose of our universe
inbox.body: Hey whats up man, this is your friend Bill.  I just realized that the universe is actually meant to transform into a huge dog/human hybrid.  If we keep dumping oil and chemicals into our rivers it should provide enought kenetic energy to encapsulate an origin of mass that is equivilent to the quantization of artificial plasm!

inbox.title: Download the new patch so we can play!
I'm thinking about getting a paint job
How do I put my new book into the google?
I am going to send you over some Hannes t-shirts
